resources.string:
Hi, my name is Piyush. 

I love Badminton. 

I wish that this love could have been realised by me a bit earlier. 
Fun fact is that I did realised it but did not find myself fitting to that frame of playing. 

I like playing badminton. It refreshes my mind - actually my soul. 
And sometimes I even forget all my tensions and just go crazy behind playing. 
And even I forget my senses, I do not kind of feel pain. 

Once, when I was in my hostel, I saw one of my seniors playing the game so well. 

It made me ask him that from when was he playing badminton. Getting shocked by his answer 
I came to know that he was playing this from past 13 years and his age was 17. 

Since then my love towards badminton reached to the level of Romeo And Juliet!
